name: Bruise Cruise
description:
Bruise Cruise - 2D Action Platformer

UMBC Game Developers Club project for URCAD 2020.

Controls:

  • WASD for movement
  • Space to jump
  • E to attack
  • X to use power-ups

Team Names and Roles:
- Ben Przysucha, Team Lead
- Robert Avolio, Programming Lead
- Justin Loi, UI/UX Programmer
- Mathias Drgon, AI Programmer and 3D Artist
- Miguel Fuentes, 3D Artist and Animator
- Adam Jordan, Sound Design and Music
- Alex Adkins, VFX Programmer
